name: Inanis (demo)
description:
Inanis is a rogue-lite deck-builder currently under development. The game-play brings the player through boss fight after boss fight, only allowing them to go to a shop along the way.  Inanis draws inspiration from games like Slay the Spire, Cup-head, and Dark Souls, drawing together many concepts to create a punishing product. Combat is based around being blind to the enemies intentions. Unlike other deck-builders, the only way to penetrate the fog of battle is through memorization and skill.

This Demo includes:

  • The first Area
  • 5 bosses
  • The first character
  • Curses, a shop, and over 50 cards
  • A myriad of bugs and balancing issues!

Any and all comments and suggestions are appreciated, and you can follow my progress at https://twitter.com/TheBlazingOak
